Sentencas: Flat yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) films were prepared by the doctor blade technique.
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks

Sentencas: The joining of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack was carried out using La0.7Ca0.3+xCrO3 (x=0.03 and 0.06)
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks

Sentencas: green films as sealants between the YSZ electrolyte layer and the La0.8Ca0.2+yCrO3 (y = 0.02 and 0.03) separator.
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks

Sentencas: Reactions between the component layers of the stack were examined in terms of elemental diffusion.
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks

Sentencas: The YSZ film produced by the doctor blade technique yields about the same electrical conductivity as the YSZ pellet.
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks

Sentencas: During the joining, the Ca in the sealant diffused and dissolved into YSZ and La0.8Ca0.23CrO3, and the sealants reacted with YSZ to form CaZrO3 phase at the interface.
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks

Sentencas: The joining was accomplished by the formation of thick CaZrO3 layers at the interface.
Titulo: Reactions of (La,Ca) CrO3 sealants in yttria-stabilized zirconia-(La,Ca) CrO3 planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks
